message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000, considering its unique features and benefits.
Alice, $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $14,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is too low for me. I could let it go for $18,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment.
Alice,  $18,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $16,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
